mapper.sql: a.ID as "id" , a.RY_ID as "ryId" , a.XM as "xm" , a.ZGBH as "zgbh" , a.CG_LB as "cgLb" , a.CG_GB as "cgGb" , a.CG_RW as "cgRw" , a.CG_FS as "cgFs" , a.CG_RQ as "cgRq" , a.YHG_RQ as "yhgRq" , a.HG_RQ as "hgRq" , a.REMARKS as "remarks" , a.ENABLE_FLAG as "enableFlag" , a.DEL_FLAG as "delFlag" , a.CREATE_BY as "createBy" , a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , a.UPDATE_BY as "updateBy" , a.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM t_dp_cgxx a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dp_cgxx( ID , RY_ID , XM , ZGBH , CG_LB , CG_GB , CG_RW , CG_FS , CG_RQ , YHG_RQ , HG_RQ , REMARKS , ENABLE_FLAG , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) values( #{id} , #{ryId} , #{xm} , #{zgbh} , #{cgLb} , #{cgGb} , #{cgRw} , #{cgFs} , #{cgRq} , #{yhgRq} , #{hgRq} , #{remarks} , #{enableFlag} , #{delFlag} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )
